text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now it's time… for the last one!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This will take us to the farthest 
point, 3600 meters…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If I win today… I'm 
a stayer, aren't I?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I can even conquer the entire 
Bakushin Road now, don't you think!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Because I'm going to run 
the whole 3600 meters!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I guess that's Trainer's habit! 
Lots of nodding, thank you very much for 
that!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come now, let's go, Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
――The strongest stayer who
simultaneously possesses speed will have
her Baku-birthday today!!
